page.title: 07ATTITUDES - Block Survey.
page.content:
INVOLVEMENT IN Not interested (58) CONSERVATION Tree planting (22) WORK. Path repair ( 9) Other ( 7)
KNOW WHO TO Ranger Service (44) CONTACT. Police (37) '999' Services (13) Anyone around ( 7) No idea (12)
GENERAL COMMENTS.(Most people added no further comments) More native British trees planted. Nice to see an area so unspoilt. Parts reserved for dogs to run free. To remain as natural as possible. Keep it wild not turned into suburban park for people who dont like it. More signposted walks.Would use it more but dont feel safe alone.Open more areas to people.(RB Berkswich)
